title: HTML Description Lists
text: A description list is a list of terms, with a description of each term.

The <dl> tag defines the description list, the 
<dt> tag defines the term (name), and the 
<dd> 
tag describes each term:

Example

<dl>
 
<dt>Coffee</dt>
 
<dd>- black hot drink</dd>
 
<dt>Milk</dt>
 
<dd>- white cold drink</dd>
</dl>

Try it Yourself »

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
<dl>
 
<dt>Coffee</dt>
 
<dd>- black hot drink</dd>
 
<dt>Milk</dt>
 
<dd>- white cold drink</dd>
</dl>

title: HTML List Tags
text: For a complete list of all available HTML tags, visit our HTML Tag Reference.
